auth.signInMessage: Sign in to manage your parking
auth.joinMessage: Create your account to get started
auth.telegramBotInstructions: to get your Telegram ID automatically.
auth.telegramOptional: You can skip this field if you don't have Telegram.
auth.telegramIdPlaceholder: Leave empty if you don't have Telegram

driver.tagline: Manage your parking bookings and find the perfect spot
driver.searchDesc: Find available parking spaces near you
driver.myBookingsDesc: View and manage your parking bookings
driver.step1: Use the Search Parking feature to find available spots in your area
driver.step2: Select your desired parking place and create a booking
driver.step3: Manage all your bookings from the My Bookings page

owner.tagline: Manage your parking places and view bookings
owner.myParkingsDesc: View and manage your parking places
owner.ownerStep1: Add your parking places with details like location, capacity, and hourly rates
owner.ownerStep2: Manage your listings and update information as needed
owner.ownerStep3: View and manage bookings for each of your parking places

parking.name: Parking Name
parking.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this parking?
parking.createFirst: Create your first parking place to get started

booking.noBookingsDesc: Start by searching for available parking spaces
booking.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
booking.bookingsWillAppear: Bookings for this parking will appear here
booking.errorPastDate: Start date and time cannot be in the past
booking.errorEndBeforeStart: End date and time must be after start date and time
booking.errorMinimumDuration: Booking must be at least 1 hour

messages.bookingCreated: Booking created successfully! View it in My Bookings.
messages.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
messages.usernameLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long
messages.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Please top up your balance to create a booking.
messages.paymentFailed: Payment processing failed. Please check your balance and try again.

validation.pleaseFixErrors: Please fix the errors before submitting
validation.emailLength: Email must be between 5 and 254 characters
validation.loginLength: Username must be between 3 and 50 characters
validation.loginPattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validation.passwordLength: Password must be between 8 and 128 characters
validation.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
validation.parkingNameLength: Parking name must be between 3 and 100 characters
validation.cityLength: City must be between 2 and 50 characters
validation.addressLength: Address must be between 5 and 200 characters
validation.hourlyRateInvalid: Hourly rate must be a positive number
validation.promocodeCodeLength: Promocode must be between 4 and 20 characters
validation.promocodeCodePattern: Promocode can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
validation.promocodeAmountInvalid: Amount must be a positive number
validation.promocodeMaxUsesInvalid: Max uses must be at least 1

common.linkTelegram: Link your Telegram account for notifications (optional)

prometheus.name: Prometheus
prometheus.details: Query metrics and view service health

info.jaeger: Jaeger - Distributed request tracing across microservices
info.grafana: Grafana - Interactive monitoring dashboards and visualization

promocode.title: Promocode Management
promocode.subtitle: Create and manage promotional codes for users
promocode.codeDescription: Leave empty to generate automatically. Use letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores. Case-sensitive.
promocode.maxUsesDescription: How many times this promocode can be used in total

promocode.title: Promocodes
promocode.activateDescription: Enter a promocode to add funds to your balance
promocode.generateDescription: Create a promocode from your balance to share with others
